cycl.desc: An inhouse project for Paradox Interactive for a system to be used on a day-to-day basis. This project included both fron-end and back-end development from scratch aswell as a comprehensive design process that included several iterations and user tests.

portfolio.desc: When first learing about web development I set a goal for myself to create an online portfolio from scratch. This is the latest version of said portfolio that I've made using React and JavaScript. The design is made prior to development using Adobe CC.
